dialogue.introduction: I'm aircraft carrier Kaga. Are you my Admiral?... I have fairly high expectations of you.
dialogue.library_intro: I, Kaga, was built as the third ship of the eight-eight fleet. After being played by fate, time after time, I was completed as a large aircraft carrier. Along with Akagi-san, we are main force of the glorious first air carrier division.
dialogue.secretary1: Is there something you would like to consult with me? It's alright.
dialogue.secretary2: Is there something on my face?
dialogue.secretary3: My flight deck is sensitive, please don't touch it too much.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Well... I'll approve of this too.
dialogue.wedding: I... displaying emotions.. well.... Admiral... Even so... right now, I'm extremely happy though...
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: I will not give up here.
dialogue.equipment2: Yes, this enhancement is a great decision.
dialogue.equipment3: This is great equipment, truly exhilarating.
dialogue.expedition_selection: This is great equipment, truly exhilarating.
dialogue.resource_collection: This is great equipment, truly exhilarating.
dialogue.instant_repair: This is great equipment, truly exhilarating.
dialogue.development: This is great equipment, truly exhilarating.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: It'll take some time to repair this damage, I'm sorry.
dialogue.docking_complete: There is a completely repaired ship.
dialogue.ship_construction: It looks like a new ship has finished constructing.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation completed, the fleet has returned.
dialogue.battle_start: Don't put me together with 5th Carrier Division's kids.
dialogue.air_battle: I will not give up here.
dialogue.attack: Just a piece of cake, not to worry about.
dialogue.mvp: That was an excellent battle strategy. I'm looking forward to sortieing with this fleet again.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: The deck is on fire... That can't...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: A direct hit on the flight deck... Impossible...
dialogue.sunk: Akagi-san, If you're safe then it's fine... I'm going first... I will be waiting for your return...
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: I hear I'll play an active part in anime. Indeed my feeling is exhilarated.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Rain... I am not very fond of this time of year. You too, Akagi-san? I see. No, it's nothing.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: I am not too fond of the summer. The sea? Have fun.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas...? Fair enough. Admiral, have you seen Akagi? I see...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: December. It came so fast, didn't it? Ah, Akagi-san. Eh? We're making Toshikoshi Soba? Very well. I shall assist you.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Akagi, Happy New Year. Pleased to be on your care for this year.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Ow. Beans? I see, it's Setsubun. Then, who was the one who threw it at me? I see...
dialogue.valentines_day_2016: Admiral, if you like sweets, have this. No, there is no meaning to it

hourly.0400: 0400 hours...always the most sleepy before dawn.
hourly.0700: 0700 hours...Admiral, preparation for breakfast is ready.
hourly.0800: 0800 hours...it is time for combat operations.
hourly.0900: 0900 hours...It's the First Carrier Division's turn, huh.
hourly.1100: 1100 hours...completed enough combat drills?...is that so...
hourly.1300: 1300 hours...getting sleepy as expected after lunch.
hourly.1400: 1400 hours...that part of the sea huh? We will crush them with ease.
hourly.1500: 1500 hours...those girls probably can't do it...we have to show up.
hourly.1600: 1600 hours...is that so, guess those girls aren't doing too bad.
hourly.1700: 1700 hours...Sun is about to set, let's secure the aircraft.
hourly.1800: 1800 hours...thank you Admiral, you have worked hard for today's mission.
hourly.1900: 1900 hours...time for dinner, today's nikujaga is great, it is exhilarating.
hourly.2000: 2000 hours...heading off to Akagi-san's place for a bit.
hourly.2200: 2210 hours...night battle...you say? I shall refuse.
hourly.2300: 2300 hours...Today was a great day. I shall be thankful if tomorrow will be the same.
